abilities.name: Fusion Driver
abilities.description: Automatic heat-based weapon. Deals more damage at closer range.

abilities.name: Energy Javelin
abilities.description: Launch your javelin at an enemy to stun and knock them back. More effective if the enemy hits a wall.

abilities.name: Fortify
abilities.description: Gain temporary health, reducing all damage taken and becoming immune to critical damage like headshots as well as movement-imparing effects. While active, heat generated by your weapon is reduced.

abilities.name: Javelin Spin
abilities.description: Spin your javelin to destroy projectiles and block melee attacks, while also pushing enemies and increasing forward speed.

abilities.name: Terra Surge
abilities.description: Sweep in enemies and anchor down, gaining the effects of Fortify and charging up a surge of damage. Press again to unleash the surge early.
